DOC.brief_summary: This two part study evaluate safety tolerability MK0429 addition assess 's pharmacokinetic profile pharmacodynamic response .
DOC.brief_title: MK0429 Study Prostate Cancer Patients With Metastatic Bone Disease ( 0429-011 )
DOC.criteria: Eligible patient must : Prostate cancer Bone metastases without symptom Lack response hormone therapy evidence rise PSA clinical progression Prostate cancerrelated bone pain Previously receive bisphosphonate therapy ( e.g . zoledronate ) Received investigational treatment within last 30 day
